body_html: So the merge conflict was because some basic checking for the existence of the NCCL license was added recently. I added a check for the license for each of the scenarios listed in the description. I also reformatted a bit for consistency.

body: So the merge conflict was because some basic checking for the existence of the NCCL license was added recently. I added a check for the license for each of the scenarios listed in the description. I also reformatted a bit for consistency.
